rows.label: qev075304_MSG0001
rows.name:
You have me beat, my friend. Amazing!
It's like you're growing at 10 times my own speed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075304_JNK0010
rows.name: Downplay

rows.label: qev075304_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Gi Zang that he's also grown stronger.

rows.label: qev075304_JNK0020
rows.name: Taunt

rows.label: qev075304_SEL0021
rows.name: Gloat over your victory to provoke Gi Zang.

rows.label: qev075304_MSG0002
rows.name:
I feel pride upon hearing such words from you.
But I still have a very long way to go.
This is not enough to crush my foes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075304_MSG0003
rows.name:
Ha ha ha! After losing this many times in a row,
I cannot argue the point.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075304_MSG0004
rows.name: ...You see, Tolba? I'm nothing special.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075304_MSG0005
rows.name: Not true! Watching you both fight moved me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075304_MSG0006
rows.name:
Now I can give up with clear heart.
There is no place for me here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075304_MSG0007
rows.name: Thank you, Master. And you, Earth alien.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075304_JNK0030
rows.name: Suggest

rows.label: qev075304_SEL0031
rows.name:
Tell Tolba that he'll find
his own path to strength.

rows.label: qev075304_JNK0040
rows.name: Urge

rows.label: qev075304_SEL0041
rows.name: Encourage Gi Zang to take on Tolba as his student.

rows.label: qev075304_MSG0008
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075304_MSG0009
rows.name:
Bah. How can I live with myself if I ignore someone
who has been through the same horrors I have?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075304_MSG0010
rows.name:
I'm still not strong enough to take on an apprentice,
but give me some time and I will be.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075304_MSG0011
rows.name:
During that time, you can work on increasing your
own strength and courage. This shall be the first step
in a much longer road.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075304_MSG0012
rows.name:
So yes—I will make you my student.
But only if you push yourself to your limits![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075304_MSG0013
rows.name: R-really?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075304_MSG0014
rows.name:
No more talk! Go begin your training at once!
If I think you've slacked off for even a day,
my offer is forfeit.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075304_MSG0015
rows.name:
Y-yes, Master! I will do many push-ups every day!
Swing many swords! Grow strong like you![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075304_MSG0016
rows.name: ...Heh. Did you see the grin on his face?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075304_MSG0017
rows.name: He reminds me of an old friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075304_MSG0018
rows.name:
A meek personality inside a body big as a mountain.
I tried to give him some fighting tips once,
but he never had a talent for it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075304_MSG0019
rows.name:
Still, he never ran away from the training,
even when it got rough. Never complained.
He had real guts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075304_MSG0020
rows.name:
...Hmm? You want to know where is he now?
I am afraid he died facing down the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075304_MSG0021
rows.name:
But I hear he fought bravely to the very end.
And that he died the proud death of a Wrothian.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075304_MSG0022
rows.name: Maybe with Tolba I can—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075304_MSG0023
rows.name: G-gwaaaaaaugh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075304_MSG0024
rows.name: That sounded like Tolba![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075304_MSG0025
rows.name: And...a jacul rage?! Damn![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075304_MSG0026
rows.name:
I'm going after it, [ST:playername ]!
It has Tolba![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev075304_MSG0027
rows.name: Hold on, Tolba! I do not give you permission to die![ST:wait ]
